trait_magic_pyro_info: Born with the ability to control the element of fire, this unit is a Pyro Mage.
trait_magic_aero_info: Born with the ability to control the element of air, this unit is a Aero Mage.
trait_magic_aqua_info: Born with the ability to control the element of water, this unit is a Aqua Mage.
trait_magic_terra_info: Born with the ability to control the element of earth, this unit is a Terra Mage.
trait_magic_haro_info: Born with the ability to control the element of light, this unit is a Haro Mage.
trait_magic_barku_info: Born with the ability to control the element of darkness, this unit is a Barku Mage.
trait_magic_none_info: A neutral soul without elemental control but still able to learn new magics.
trait_magic_orl_info: A unique magic affinity given by the Gods. This unit can be reborn after death three times.
spell_magic_orl_passive_info: A passive spell that allows the unit to reincarnate thrice.
trait_magic_demonlord_info: A cursed lord whose soul refuses to die; its eternal rebirth spell never runs out of lives.
spell_magic_demonlord_eternal_info: The caster is bound to an unending rebirth that keeps them alive forever.
spell_magic_demonlord_judgement_info: Detonates a Tsar-sized apocalypse on the chosen region while the caster stays untouched.
trait_magic_hero_info: Legendary heroes do not reincarnate, but their power triples for every ten years they live.
trait_magic_god_info: The divine patron who blesses the Hero, their party, and the Mentor while balance holds the realm together.
trait_magic_hero_party_white_info: A protective cleric who trails the Hero, sharing their battles and soothing wounds.
trait_magic_hero_party_tank_info: A shield-breaking bruiser that stands over the Hero's shoulders, taking hits and dishing them back.
trait_magic_hero_party_assassin_info: A shadow-born killer that stalks the Hero's foe and strikes the moment the Hero attacks.
trait_magic_hero_party_knight_info: A stalwart warrior who mirrors the Hero's duels and defends their flank.
trait_magic_hero_party_archer_info: A ranged specialist who rains arrows on whatever the Hero focuses.
trait_magic_hero_party_barbarian_info: A savage ally that charges in sync with the Hero and keeps enemies pinned.
trait_magic_mentor_info: A lone guardian who follows one Hero and enables the sealing of the Demon Lord.
trait_magic_sealed_info: Marks a Demon Lord frozen beneath a binding that lasts eighty years.
trait_magic_permasealed_info: Marks a Demon Lord frozen beneath a binding that never expires; only the player can break it.
spell_magic_pyro_flare_info: Ignites a focused burst that scorches the target tile and sprays flame onto nearby ground.
spell_magic_pyro_rain_info: Summons a crimson downpour that drenches the caster's area in burning blood rain.
spell_magic_pyro_shield_info: Encases the caster in molten armor that soaks up incoming blows.
spell_magic_pyro_burst_info: Detonates a burst of burning blood that sears foes in close range.
spell_magic_aero_torrent_info: Conjures a twisting tornado that pins enemies between wind walls.
spell_magic_aero_crackle_info: Lances a distant foe with a crackling arc of storm energy.
spell_magic_aero_shift_info: Blurs the caster into a gale and teleports them across the battlefield.
spell_magic_aero_whirl_info: Summons a violent whirlwind that rips through distant enemies.
spell_magic_aqua_wave_info: Plants a ring of seedlings that sprout instantly, carpeting the target region in green growth.
spell_magic_aqua_deluge_info: Unleashes a nutrient-rich deluge that spawns fertilizer and drenches nearby ground.
spell_magic_aqua_refresh_info: Bathes allies in cleansing water so healing droplets restore their health.
spell_magic_aqua_purity_info: A focused cleanse that restores allies and scrubs lingering ailments.
spell_magic_terra_rise_info: Pulls skeletons from the soil to fight by the caster's side.
spell_magic_terra_quake_info: Slams a curse-laced tremor into the earth, rattling enemies and leaving maledictions behind.
spell_magic_terra_shockwave_info: Unleashes an explosive shockwave that fractures the ground beneath enemies.
spell_magic_terra_stone_info: Hewn stone barriers sprout to shelter the caster from harm.
spell_magic_haro_beam_info: Focuses a prismatic beam that sets the enemy tile ablaze and splashes fires outward.
spell_magic_haro_silence_info: Sings a bright hush that disrupts enemies and pierces buffs.
spell_magic_haro_guard_info: Weaves glimmering shields that shrug off wounds.
spell_magic_barku_blade_info: Slices foes with a dagger formed from midnight and cursed air.
spell_magic_barku_shroud_info: Cloaks the caster in ink-black mist that resists sight and spells.
spell_magic_barku_veil_info: Casts a disorienting veil that warps incoming attacks.
worldlog_magic_mentor_born_1: $special1$ swears to guard $special2$ for as long as they live.
worldlog_magic_hero_party_born_1: $special1$ joins the Hero's Party, matching their every fight.
worldlog_magic_hero_born_1: $special1$ rises from humble blood, the heavens parting as their voice swears to carry light into every shadow.
worldlog_magic_hero_fallen_1: $special1$ collapses beneath crushing weight, the winds screaming as their fading light echoes across the plains.
worldlog_magic_demonlord_born_1: $special1$ tears through the veil, raining embers and thunder on kingdoms that dared to hope.
worldlog_magic_demonlord_fallen_1: $special1$ spills into ash and blood, the world still trembling with the memory of their blaze.
worldlog_magic_demonlord_sealed_1: $special1$ is dragged into chains forged by $special2$, the Mentor's light strangling their roar.
worldlog_magic_demonlord_unsealed_1: $special1$ rises as the centuries-old wards shatter, the earth shuddering beneath returning havoc.
worldlog_magic_god_born_1: $special1$ stands upon mortal soil, bending starlight as they promise to shepherd the trembling realms.
worldlog_magic_god_fallen_1: $special1$ tumbles from the heavens, their divine flame guttering while the world gasps for the order they once held.
trait_mage_apprentice_info: A fledgling spellcaster still learning their first incantations.
trait_mage_formal_info: A practiced spellcaster that has proven themselves in combat.
trait_mage_archmage_info: A master of the arcane, wielding power few can match.
status_description_charging_magia: Gathering strength for $spell$ before unleashing Magia.
